page.title: 09West Indians in S. Bradford.
page.content: On Sunday morning I attend church.It is situated on Church Street and is called the{Moravian Church.}I do not attend church as often as I did when I was younger.I usually only attend church when we have a parade which is the first Sunday in the month.I also attend the 9th Bradford Company{Girls {Brigade}who are associated with our church.There are 4 groups in our Girls Brigade;Explorers,Juniors,Seniors and Brigades.I am a Senior.I started to go when I was 5,now I am 13.The Girls Brigade motto is{'Seek,Serve and {Follow Christ'.}Our chuch service lasts for half an hour for children but adults stay for 45 minutes.I enjoy family services at church because mothers bring their children to join in the service.
